name: DevContainer with PostgreSQL, Redis, and WeasyPrint
postCreateCommand: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y postgresql-client build-essential python3-dev python3-pip python3-setuptools python3-wheel python3-cffi libcairo2 libpango-1.0-0 libpangocairo-1.0-0 libgdk-pixbuf2.0-0 libffi-dev shared-mime-info && cd /e-commerce-api && pip install --upgrade pip && pip install psycopg2-binary && pip install -r requirements.txt && python -c 'import time; import socket; s = socket.socket(); time.sleep(5); s.connect(("db", 5432))' && python manage.py migrate || exit 1
